entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
